content: as double_crochet double_crochet in same st and next 52 sts slip_stitch to chain 2 54 sts round 12 chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in same st and next 52 sts slip_stitch to chain 2 54 sts round 13 attach green yarn with slip_stitch chain 1 counts as single_crochet single_crochet in same st and next 52 sts slip_stitch to chain 1 do not tie off cont with first earflap 54 sts first earflap row 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same st and next 11 sts chain 1 turn 12 sts row 2 decrease single_crochet in next 8 sts decrease chain 1 turn 10 sts row 3 single_crochet in each st chain 1 turn 10 sts row 4 decrease single_crochet in next 6 sts decrease chain 1 turn 8 sts row 5 single_crochet in each st chain 1 turn 8 sts row 6 decrease single_crochet in next 4 sts decrease chain 1 turn 6 sts row 7 single_crochet in each st chain 1 turn 6 sts row 8 decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts decrease chain 1 turn 4 sts row 9 decrease decrease chain 1 turn 2 sts row 10 decrease tie off second earflap row 1 leaving 18 sts bet first and second earflaps along front of beanie attach green yarn with slip_stitch chain 1 single_crochet in same st and next 11 sts chain 1 turn 12 sts row 2-9 cont as for first earflap 3 row 10 decrease chain 1 counts as single_crochet turn 2 single_crochet in middle of decrease single_crochet around for edging 3 single_crochet in middle of decrease at base of second earflap slip_stitch to chain 1 tie off and weave in all ends spikes make 5 work continuously do not join after each round round 1 with yellow yarn magic_ring chain 1 counts as single_crochet 5 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 sts round 2 *2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat 8 sts round 3 *2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 sts* repeat 10 sts round 4 *2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 sts* repeat 12 sts round 5 *2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 5 sts* repeat 14 sts round 6 *2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 6 sts* repeat 16 sts round 7 *2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 7 sts* repeat slip_stitch to next st tie off leaving long tail to sew spike to beanie 18 sts tassels optional cut three strands of orange green and yellow yarn each approximately 70 cm in length thread bundle of yarn through large hole at base of first earflap bet 2 decrease sts of row 10 and pull to even lengths of yarn on either side of hole tie overhand knot just below base of earflap divide strands of yarn into three groups according to colour and braid/plait to desired length fasten with overhand knot and trim to neaten repeat for second earflap ensuring that tassels are an equal length pattern toddler approximately 6-18 months round 1 with orange yarn magic_ring chain 2 counts as double_crochet 11 double_crochet
